content.p1: This is a platform for Full Stack projects using Next.js. It provides an effective structure for the development of web applications with modern technologies. Key technologies are:
content.p2: Whether you create your first application or manage complex projects, this platform offers the tools necessary to start quickly with a minimum configuration
